general.name: Name
general.subject: Subject
home.teaser:
A free and easy booking system for your common laundry.{nl}
Reserve your laundry machines where ever you are!
home.quickstart.signup: Sign up your laundry in three easy steps. {nl}It's 100% free!
home.quickstart.create: Create a Laundree account using your e-mail address.{nl}Don’t worry, we wont spam you or anything.
home.quickstart.register: Register your laundry with its washing machines and dryers.{nl}You can register as many as you want!
home.quickstart.invite: Invite your tenants to use laundree.{nl}All you need is their e-mail addresses.
home.start-demo: ... or spin up a live demo before you decide.
contact.title: Contact
contact.message: Having any concerns or questions? Please don't hesitate to contact us via. the form below.
footer.donate: Do you want to help us keep the servers running at full throttle? Then feel free to donate via {link}
footer.github: Laundree is 100% open-source and any contribution is highly appreciated File an issue, create a pull-request, or fork us on {link}
footer.contact: Want to know more? Please contact and we'll try our best to reply in a timely manner. You can find our contact details at the {link}
footer.created: Created by Christian Budde Christensen and Malene Sjørslev Søholm in {link}
auth.login.title: Log in to
auth.login.notice: Notice: By logging in without an account, we will register you and you will be accepting our {toc} and {pp}.
auth.signup.success: A verification link has been sent
auth.signup.error.already-exists: A user with this email already exists
auth.signup.title: Sign-up for an account
auth.signup.notice: By signing up you agree with our {toc} and {pp}.
auth.forgot.title: Reset your password
auth.forgot.success: A reset link has been sent
auth.error.not-verified: The email provided isn't verified. Please check your inbox or {link}
auth.error.invalid-email: Please enter a valid e-mail address
auth.error.invalid-password: Min. 6 characters containing at least one letter
auth.links.forgot.link: Let us send you a new one.
auth.links.signup: Do you not have an account? {link}
auth.links.login2: Did you find your verification e-mail? {link}
support.title: Support
support.message: Experiencing any problems using this amazing system? Do you have any feedback that you want to share? Pleasecontact us with the form below, and we'll get right back at you!
timetable.title: Timetable
timetable.no-machines.title: There are no machines registered
timetable.no-machines.action.wait: Please tell your landlord to register some machines.
auth.verification.title: Re-send verification email
auth.verification.success: A new verification link has been sent.
home.logged-in.title: Couldn't find any laundry...
home.logged-in.message:
It doesn't seem like you have any laundry attached to your account
 If you want to share your machines with your tenants, please create a new laundry.
home.logged-in.message.tenant:
Are you a tenant who wants to use laundree for your laundry?
 Please tell yourlandlord to use Laundree or invite you if he already is.
home.logged-in.error.invalid-laundry-nam: Please enter a name for your laundry.
home.logged-in.error.duplicate: A laundry by that name already exists
bookings.title: Your bookings
bookings.modal.delete-booking: Are you sure that you want to delete this booking?
users.modal.delete-user: Are you absolutely sure that you want to delete this user?
users.modal.delete-invite: Are you absolutely sure that you want to delete this invitation?
document-title.pp-and-toc: Privacy Policy and Terms and conditions
users.title: Laundry users
users.qr-signup.message:
You can invite your tenant by generating a PDF document, printing this, and hanging it in your laundry.{nl}
This will enable everyone with physical access to your machines, to register on your laundry.
users.invite.demo: Sorry, but you can't add users to a demo laundry
users.error.invalid-email: Please enter a valid email address
admin-panel.title: Administrator panel
machines.modal.message: Are you sure that you want to delete this machine?
machines.error.machine-name: Please enter a unique machine name
machines.title: Machines
machines.no-machines: There are no machines registered to this laundry
machines.create-machine.title: Create machine
pp-and-toc.title: Privacy Policy and Terms and Conditions
pp-and-toc.disclaimer: {note} This is just a initial draft while we are in beta. This WILL change!
laundry-settings.title: Laundry settings
laundry-settings.leave-laundry.title: Leave laundry
laundry-settings.leave-laundry.text: If you leave the laundry, all your bookings will be lost.
laundry-settings.leave-laundry.modal.mes: Are you absolutely sure that you want to leave this laundry?
laundry-settings.booking-rules.title: Booking rules
laundry-settings.booking-rules.max-hours: Maximum {hourInput} {hour, plural, one {hour} other {hours}} of bookings
laundry-settings.booking-rules.daily-max: Maximum {hourInput} {hour, plural, one {hour} other {hours}} of bookings per day
laundry-settings.delete-laundry.title: Delete laundry
laundry-settings.delete-laundry.demo: You can not delete a demo laundry
laundry-settings.delete-laundry.text:
Deleting the laundry will remove all data associated with it and remove all users from it.{nl}
 It can NOT be undone!
laundry-settings.delete-laundry.modal.me: Are you absolutely sure that you want to delete this laundry?
user-settings.title: Profile settings
user-settings.basic-info.title: Basic user-info
user-settings.laundries.title: Laundries
user-settings.laundries.no-laundries: You have no laundries associated with your account
user-settings.email-addresses.title: E-mail addresses
user-settings.delete-account.title: Delete account
user-settings.delete-account.message.own:
Since you are a owner of at least one laundry, you cannot delete your account.{nl}
Please delete your laundries first!
user-settings.delete-account.message.use:
Deleting your account is irreversible and your information will be removed.{nl}
This including, but not limited to, bookings.
user-settings.delete-account.modal.messa: Are you absolutely sure that you want to delete your account?'
user-settings.change-password.title: Change password
error-404.title: Sorry...
error-404.message.l1: We couldn't find the page you were looking for. How about backtracking a bit and try again?
error-404.message.l2: If you keep seeing this page, please don't hesitate to write us!
error-500.title: Darn...
error-500.message: Something went wrong on our end. Don’t worry, we have logged it and will try to make sure it doesn’t happends again....
about.title: About Laundree
about.mission.title: Our mission
user-settings.calendar.title: Calendar integration
user-settings.calendar.text:
You can export your bookings to your favorite calendar application. {nl}
 Just click {link}.
pdf.invite.text.1: You can book these machines at laundree.io. Just scan the QR code below and follow the guide online.
pdf.invite.text.3: If you do not have a QR scanner, please download a free one on your device, or ask the administrator to add your e-mail address.

users.invite-form-link.text:
You can invite users by generating and sharing a link.{nl}
Please notice that everyone with the link can join your laundry.

meta.description: Laundree is an app for booking of shared laundry facilities. You can reserve your machines from the mobile. Get started online now!
